queries.errorMessage:
Here are two suggestions:

1. Make sure you have admin access to a LinkedIn Company Page.

2. From time to time, your LinkedIn OAuth token will expire. This token allows you to safely bring your data into Klipfolio. Find out how to re-authorize your OAuth tokens.
